title.narrative: Improvement of access to water in villages

description.narrative: The project aims to prevent drought in the region for people livestock and vegetation caused by recurrent problems. Drinking water and lack of water causes serious disease for people and animals.The project objective is to ensure that the village community clean water and drinking water supply throughout the year. This project is part of the reconstruction in Somaliland and the villages of placing viability which can safeguard the future of people in the area and in the village community and to increase the self-reliance of the villagers to take care of the area and the village's future.During the project which began on 1.1.2012 has already been secured (as part of the year) water intake (dug collect rain water pools). Pools the water is used for household c onsumption livestock drinking water and small-scale cultivation of irrigation water.The project period will be increased in 2012 and 2013 buried water collection ponds of the area. New reservoirs will be built around a network of wells and reservoirs.
